chunks.zh: 不知道为啥，上班越来越没劲了
chunks.en: I don't know why, but I'm losing more and more motivation to go to work.

chunks.zh: 工作差不多有 10 年了，越来越感觉上班特别没劲，精神内耗中。
chunks.en: I've been working for almost 10 years, and I feel more and more that going to work is boring, and I'm mentally exhausted.

chunks.zh: 特别是刚过完年，越没意思，也没有上班的劲了😔。
chunks.en: Especially after the New Year, it's even more boring, and I don't have the energy to go to work 😔.

chunks.zh: 不知道大家有没有这种感觉，怎么缓解了？
chunks.en: I wonder if anyone else feels this way, and how do you relieve it?

chunks.zh: 我上班四年，也是特别内耗，最后裸辞出去摩旅了大半个中国，回来之后做了大半年自己的产品，没什么人用。
chunks.en: I worked for four years, and I was also very mentally drained. Eventually, I resigned and went motorcycle traveling across most of China. After returning, I spent half a year developing my own product, but no one used it.

chunks.zh: 然后现在 gap 10 个月了，没有面试机会，开始逐渐焦虑中。
chunks.en: Now I've been on a gap year for 10 months, and I don't have any interview opportunities, so I'm starting to get anxious.

chunks.zh: 离职之前觉得这 b 班再上下去就要死了，现在 gap 久了觉得再没这 b 班上就要死了。
chunks.en: Before I resigned, I felt like I was going to die if I kept working this job. Now that I've been on a gap year for so long, I feel like I'm going to die if I don't get this job.

chunks.zh: 干了几年后才发现自己做的任何东西没有实际意义，都垃圾业务逻辑。
chunks.en: After working for a few years, I realized that nothing I was doing was meaningful, and it was all garbage business logic.

chunks.zh: 纯混饭吃
chunks.en: Just scraping by for a living.

chunks.zh: 我工作 1 年的时候就是这个感觉，你怎么 10 年才发病
chunks.en: I felt this way after working for 1 year, how did you only get sick after 10 years?

chunks.zh: 同感，工作只是劳动力换钱而已，除非是自己真正想做，不然给不了自己任何意义和价值感。
chunks.en: Same feeling, work is just exchanging labor for money, unless it's something you really want to do, it can't give you any sense of meaning or value.

chunks.zh: 我比较贪心：只想躺着，刷刷手机，看看电视，看看书，然后每个月有人按时给我发工资🐶
chunks.en: I'm more greedy: I just want to lie down, browse my phone, watch TV, read books, and then have someone pay me my salary on time every month 🐶.

chunks.zh: 都这样，感觉没法缓解，除非不干了，但是不干了之后又很焦虑
chunks.en: It's all like this, I feel like there's no way to relieve it unless you quit, but after you quit, you're very anxious.

chunks.zh: 你曾经试过上班有劲儿？
chunks.en: Have you ever tried to be motivated at work?

chunks.zh: 我很难理解。
chunks.en: I find it hard to understand.

chunks.zh: 在我的认知里，上班从来就是没劲儿的，这是定律。
chunks.en: In my perception, going to work has never been fun, it's the law.

chunks.zh: 刚工作就发病了，然后找工作只找朝九晚六双休不加班的公司，工资是低了点，但是没那么累了
chunks.en: I got sick as soon as I started working, so I only looked for companies with 9-to-5, double weekends, and no overtime. The salary is a bit lower, but it's not as tiring.

chunks.zh: @jiahee45 评论右上角移过去就显示感谢按钮了
chunks.en: @jiahee45 Move the upper right corner of the comment and the thank you button will be displayed.

chunks.zh: 刚工作时候 : 工作真好,自己赚钱自己花, 完全可以买很多之前想买没钱买的东西
chunks.en: When I first started working: Work is great, I earn my own money and spend it, I can totally buy a lot of things I wanted to buy before but couldn't afford.

chunks.zh: 钱刚刚够首付的时候 : 开始焦虑,手里这几个 b 子够干啥的啊
chunks.en: When I have just enough money for a down payment: I start to worry, what can I do with the few b's in my hand?

chunks.zh: 房价开始下跌不着急买房并且持续攒钱一段时间后 : 上班开始无聊, 但是还能坚持上班,钱对我而言不过是一串数字
chunks.en: After the housing price starts to fall, I'm not in a hurry to buy a house and continue to save money for a while: Going to work is starting to get boring, but I can still hold on, money is just a string of numbers to me.

chunks.zh: 纯攒接近 200w 的时候 :沃日你妈卖批, 老子都能吃利息活下去了,凭啥还要上这个破班,踏马的
chunks.en: When I've saved nearly 2 million: Holy shit, I can live off the interest, why do I have to go to this crappy job, damn it.

chunks.zh: 尤其是今年刚回来公司搞什么职级评定,全员参加,答不好就降级
chunks.en: Especially this year, the company is doing some kind of job level evaluation, everyone participates, and if you don't answer well, you'll be demoted.

chunks.zh: 贯穿始终 :打工人打工魂,不工作了也不知道自己能干些什么, 年纪也大了, 真要是 gap 了一年两年就彻底与程序员拜拜了,苟着吧.
chunks.en: Throughout: A worker's soul works, if I don't work, I don't know what I can do, I'm also old, if I really gap for a year or two, I'll say goodbye to being a programmer completely, I'll just scrape by.

chunks.zh: 继续积累, 为了以后真毕业了的时候有更多的选择
chunks.en: Continue to accumulate, so that I have more choices when I really graduate in the future.

chunks.zh: Not only you.
chunks.en: Not only you.

chunks.zh: 特别是今天还要补班时。
chunks.en: Especially when I have to work overtime today.

chunks.zh: 想想连过年的假期都是赊来的。
chunks.en: Thinking that even the New Year holiday is borrowed.

chunks.zh: 就很没劲。
chunks.en: It's just boring.

chunks.zh: 将军的恩情还不完呀。
chunks.en: The general's favor can never be repaid.

chunks.zh: 我没劲主要原因还是老是搞大需求，我还是喜欢流程慢搞点流程化的无脑需求。
chunks.en: The main reason I'm not motivated is that I'm always working on big requirements. I still prefer to slowly work on some procedural, mindless requirements.

chunks.zh: @66beta 你这毒抗太低了（
chunks.en: @66beta Your poison resistance is too low (

chunks.zh: 三和大神才是出路，要不然只能欺骗自己继续上下去。
chunks.en: Sanhe Great God is the only way out, otherwise you can only deceive yourself to continue going.

chunks.zh: 混口饭吃都是，又不是天选打工人 能有什么劲
chunks.en: We're all just scraping by for a living, we're not born to be workers, what motivation can we have?

chunks.zh: 因为绝大部分工作本来就是没劲的，年纪越大越能意识和接受这点。
chunks.en: Because most jobs are boring in the first place, the older you get, the more you realize and accept this.

chunks.zh: @66beta 你是 1 年发病，我是负四年发病，我考大学只是为了推迟上班。
chunks.en: @66beta You got sick in 1 year, I got sick in negative four years, I went to college just to delay going to work.

chunks.zh: 挣钱嘛，不寒颤
chunks.en: Making money, it's not shameful.
@yzw716305797 Then what should I do?

chunks.zh: @liu731 都一样，🐶着
chunks.en: @liu731 It's all the same, just scraping by 🐶
